summary: The module provides an example implementation of an image‑to‑image generation pipeline that merges Stable Diffusion with ControlNet conditioning. It defines a pipeline class that encodes text prompts, prepares latent representations, runs the diffusion process with ControlNet guidance, and applies safety checking to output the final images.
business_intent: Show developers how to integrate ControlNet into Stable Diffusion for guided image‑to‑image creation, enabling the production of customized visual content while ensuring safety compliance.
